parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the group. The value can be up to 256 characters in length.

parameters.name: GroupExternalId
parameters.description: The external ID of the group, which can be used to associate the group with an external system. By default, the external ID is the group ID. The value can be up to 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the group. The name can be up to 64 characters in length.
